Recullet Hell


What is this?

Recursive Bullet Hell.

This was a project that expands off a Recursive Tetris project that I made for Hack CU V. In this game, you play a bullet hell, and try to survive a wave. Once you've survived the wave, another wave opens up in a separate layer, and you have to play through that layer. However, all of the other layers are still going...
The goal of the game is to beat the boss on Layer 7. There are 3 difficulties that affect how benevolent the game is (Basic has 0 HP, so you just need to get hit the least amount of times. Benevolent has 15 HP per layer, but if you die in a layer you can just restart that layer. Brutal also has 15 HP per layer, but if you die in a layer you have to start the whole game over.)

Controls

Arrow Keys: Move Around
Space: Shoot
Z/X: Alternate Between Different Layers
Enter: Pause a Layer (Pausing a Layer will pause all future layers, but no past layers.)
Escape: Go back to the Difficulty Selection Screen/Title Screen.

Technologies Used/Licenses

This uses p5.js and the Roboto font.
p5.js uses the GNU LGPL.
Roboto (The font I'm using in the game) uses the Apache 2.0 License.
